attributes.action: remember that he is not here to lead the British people, but to serve them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are sick to death of having a Prime Minister who considers himself untouched by the will of the British people, never listening to the public, always pressing ahead with unpopular policies and consistently failing to take responsibility for the failures of this Government. In recent weeks he has been quoted as saying it has been an honour to lead the British people. We would like to petition Mr Blair to remember that he is a public servant, in the service of the British people and as such is a servant to the public of the United Kingdom. He is here to serve us, not 'lead' us (what ever that means). He should know his place.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
